info.title: Supercheck API
info.description: API for test automation, monitoring, and CI/CD integration. Supercheck provides Playwright browser testing, k6 performance testing, uptime monitoring, and alerting — all managed via API or CLI.

get.description: Returns the health status of the API and its dependencies (database, Redis, storage).
Returns available geographic locations for test and monitor execution.
List all CLI tokens for the current project. Also used by `supercheck whoami` to verify the current token.

post.description: Create a new CLI token for API access. The plain token value is returned only once in the response.

expiresIn.description: Optional expiration duration in seconds (min 3600 = 1 hour, max 31536000 = 1 year)

201.description: Token created. The `key` field contains the plain token — store it securely, it cannot be retrieved again.

409.description: Duplicate token name within this project

patch.description: Enable, disable, or rename a CLI token.

delete.description: Permanently delete a CLI token. This action cannot be undone.

get.description: List all jobs in the current project with pagination.

post.description: Create a new job with optional scheduling and test configuration.

patch.description: Update job configuration. Only provided fields are changed.

post.description: Trigger a job run. Supports both CLI tokens (`sck_live_*`) and trigger keys (`sck_trigger_*`).
Execute a job immediately, bypassing the cron schedule.

get.description: List job runs with optional filters for job ID and status.
Quick status check for a run without full details.
Stream live console output from a running job execution using Server-Sent Events.
List all tests in the current project with optional search and type filters.

post.description: Create a new test with a script file. Supported types: `playwright` (browser/API tests) and `k6` (performance tests).

parameters.name: includeScript
parameters.description: Include the script content in the response

post.description: Create a new uptime or performance monitor.

get.description: Returns performance statistics including uptime percentage, average response time, and p95 latency.
List all environment variables for the current project. Secret values are redacted.

post.description: Send a test notification to verify provider configuration before saving.

get.description: View the history of triggered alerts.
View audit trail of organization actions. Requires admin permissions.

bearerAuth.description: CLI token (`sck_live_*`) for full API access, or trigger key (`sck_trigger_*`) for job trigger endpoint only.
